alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 18 at 2:32AM EST until November 21 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of lake effect snow downwind of Lake Ontario will stretch into Northern Oneida County. Snow will be heaviest during the daytime hours on Sunday, which will make traveling difficult as roads become snow covered. Gusty winds will lead to whiteout conditions as well. Snow comes to an end Sunday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
